alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 15 at 8:30PM MST until December 16 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 35 to 45 MPH with gusts up to 65 MPH. * WHERE...South Laramie Range, South Laramie Range Foothills, and Central Laramie County including Interstate 80 between Laramie and Cheyenne. This includes the city of Cheyenne. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Friday. The strongest winds are expected overnight into early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
